items.title: Late Car Payments Are Piling Up at Record Levels as More Drivers Face Delinquency
items.description: U.S. subprime auto delinquencies reached 6.65% in October, according to Fitch Ratings, which has tracked the data since the early '90s.

items.description: The idea is to balance fixed and variable income streams.
